FuncDef: The display auto-upgrade model command displays whether the automatic logic upgrade function is enabled for boards.

ParaDef.Info:
Ap index.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1024 to 8191 .

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On the Router, the automatic logic upgrade function can be enabled or disabled based on configurations.
If the function is enabled, the system compares the logic version of a newly inserted board with the current system logic version or compares the log version of boards with a newly upgraded system logic version. If any difference is found, the logic version of the boards is updated.
The display auto-upgrade model command is used to query whether the automatic logic upgrade function is enabled for boards.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
